scripts.docker:clean: docker-compose down -v && docker volume prune -f && docker-compose build --no-cache && docker-compose up
scripts.migrate:auth: docker-compose exec auth-service bun run db:migrate
scripts.migrate:garage: docker-compose exec garage-service bun run db:migrate
scripts.migrate:booking: docker-compose exec booking-service bun run db:migrate
scripts.migrate:all: bun run migrate:auth && bun run migrate:garage && bun run migrate:booking
scripts.generate:auth: docker-compose exec auth-service bun run db:generate
scripts.generate:garage: docker-compose exec garage-service bun run db:generate
scripts.generate:booking: docker-compose exec booking-service bun run db:generate
scripts.seed:auth: docker-compose exec auth-service bun run db:seed
scripts.seed:garage: docker-compose exec garage-service bun run db:seed
scripts.seed:booking: docker-compose exec booking-service bun run db:seed
scripts.seed:all: bun run seed:auth && bun run seed:garage && bun run seed:booking
scripts.studio:auth: docker-compose exec auth-service bun run db:studio
scripts.studio:garage: docker-compose exec garage-service bun run db:studio
scripts.studio:booking: docker-compose exec booking-service bun run db:studio
